
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VAudioInfoFramePacket.cpp
          VAudioInfoFramePacket.h
          VAudioInfoFramePacket__Syms.cpp
          VAudioInfoFramePacket__Syms.h
  DEPENDS AudioInfoFramePacket.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/AudioInfoFramePacket.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VAudioInfoFramePacket STATIC VAudioInfoFramePacket.cpp VAudioInfoFramePacket__Syms.cpp
    AudioInfoFramePacket.v
)

target_compile_options(VAudioInfoFramePacket PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VAudioInfoFramePacket PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VAudioInfoFramePacket verilated)
